day name: Veneration of the Precious and Life-Giving Cross Sunday
crossDismissal: , the veneration of Which we celebrate today
troparia: (Tone 1) Save Your people, O Lord, and bless Your inheritance.* Grant victory to Your faithful people against enemies,* and protect Your community by Your Cross.
kontakia: (Tone 7) No longer does the flaming sword guard the gate of Eden;* the tree of the Cross has quenched its flames gloriously.* The sting of death and the victory of Hades are banished,* and You O my Saviour came and called to those in Hades: “Return again to Paradise!”
